text: Aur hum ney unn kay peechay essa bin marium ko bheja jo apney say pehlay ki kitab yaani toraat ki tasdeeq kerney walay thay aur hum ney unhen injeel ata farmaee jiss mein noor aur hidayat thi aur woh apney say pehlay ki kitab toraat ki tasdeeq kerti thi aur woh sira sir hidayat-o-naseehat thi paarsa logon kay liye
